caption:
This photograph depicts a scene at an outdoor dining setting. Featured prominently are a woman and a man seated next to each other with a sunlit stucco wall behind them, which carries a decorative element resembling a sun or flame motif.

The woman, to the left, has styled blonde hair and wears a black outfit accessorized with a long necklace. She appears composed and is glancing toward the camera with a neutral or possibly reflective expression. 

Beside her, the man has a rugged, seasoned look with a beard and moustache, wearing a jacket with a fur-like collar and sporting a woolly sweater underneath. His expression seems contemplative or mildly discontent as he gazes away from the camera.

In the foreground, there are various items on the table indicative of a meal that might include beverages in textured glass tumblers, condiments, and utensils laid out. Other guests feature partially in the image, with a glimpse of a person in a distinctive white cap and another in a red-and-white garment, both facing away from the camera.

Overall, the atmosphere is casual and appears to be a social gathering, possibly during a cooler season given the attire of the people and the indirect, soft nature of the sunlight.
title: Skiers enjoy late afternoon sun and a snack
